description: Users can now edit their username and email with pencil icons that appear on each field

view_mode.display: Username and Email fields with pencil (Edit2) icon on the right
view_mode.action: Click pencil icon to enter edit mode

edit_mode.display: Input field with green checkmark (save) and red X (cancel) icons on the right
edit_mode.save_icon: Green checkmark icon - saves the changes
edit_mode.cancel_icon: Red X icon - discards changes and returns to view mode

styling.profile_value_row: Displays value with pencil icon on the right
styling.profile_edit_row: Displays input field with save/cancel icons on the right
styling.profile_icon_btn: Icon buttons with hover effects and disabled state
